title: Pizzo di Brünesc
text: Pizzo di Brünesc (also known as "Pizzo di Brunescio") is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> of the <a href="Lepontine%20Alps">Lepontine Alps</a>, overlooking <a href="Cavergno">Cavergno</a>, in the canton of <a href="Ticino">Ticino</a>. It lies at the southern end of the chain between the Val Bavona and Valle di Peccia.
